column5: I'VE BEEN THINKING OF BOOKING A TRIP WITH THIS PLACE AND NOW ACCORDING TO A CO-WORKER IT HAS CHANGED HANDS.SOMETIMES WHEN A PLACE CHANGES OWNERS THE SERVICE ETC. GOES DOWN HILL.HAS ANYBODY HEARD IF THIS RUMOR IS TRUE?? DAN.

Dont know if it is true about the sale....but I have found that new owners have a tendecy to be MORE service minded....after all they have just taken on some debt and NEED your business now and in the future....give them a chance.
Duh--thanks for the informative reply---next time I want an answer like that I'll just ask the wife. dan.
Sounds like asking your wife might be a large upgrade in your decision making process.
Actually, what else is there to say, he's right...
